easy-2: Dream big, work hard, stay humble.
medium-1: Turn setbacks into comebacks. Keep pushing, keep shining!
medium-2: Embrace challenges, thrive under pressure, keep moving forward!
hard-1: In the grand scheme of things, every setback is a setup for a comeback. Keep pushing, keep growing, keep shining!
hard-2: When life throws you a curveball, knock it out of the park. Stay resilient, stay determined, and keep moving forward!
